title: Understanding Cultural Diversity
text: Cultural diversity refers to the presence of multiple cultural groups within a society. It involves recognizing and respecting the differences among these groups.

title: Key Aspects of Cultural Diversity
text: Consider how cultural diversity involves not just the presence of different cultures, but also the interaction and mutual respect among them.

hintAnswer: a variety of communities that are very different from one another
title: Defining Cultural Diversity
text: Which of the following best describes cultural diversity?
choices: a variety of communities that are very different from one another
nurturing a community that acknowledges, respects, and has regard for people from all different cultures
Respecting and learning about the cultures of others while exploring one’s own cultural biases
personal awareness of one’s own limited knowledge of the client’s culture
